thread.title: Jennifer Brant
thread.title_full: Optima Tax Relief reviewed by Jennifer Brant

author: Jennifer Brant
title: Jennifer Brant
text:
All the professionals I worked with to take care of my tax issues were knowledgeable and worked hard on my behalf. They listened to me and the hardship that I was going through. They did an amazing job getting my tax debt down to more then what I could afford.
Thank you Optima
